title: Watch Ariana Grande, Miley Cyrus, and Lana Del Rey’s Video
text:
The McG-helmed Charlie’s Angels utilized Destiny’s Child in their prime for its theme song magnum opus. This reboot requires a super group of the biggest names in pop. On September 10, the power trio of Ariana Grande, Miley Cyrus, and Lana Del Rey teased their new music video for “Don’t Call Me Angel.” The gals walked into some sort of crypt or church in black angel wings, signifying that they were not, in point of fact, angelic. The video, directed by Hannah Lux, also shows weapons expert Lana and champion boxer Miley. Ariana has a walkie-talkie, so I guess she’s the ringleader? Good for her! Charlie’s Angels dropkicks into theaters November 15.

Related
description: Lana Del Rey, Miley Cyrus, and Ariana Grande combined forces to drop “Not Your Angel,” for the Elizabeth Banks-helmed Charlie’s Angels reboot. The movie features Kristen Stewart and Noah Centineo. The song dropped at midnight Friday the 13th. Spooky.
